name: AiScan: All QR Code Scanner & Barcode Reader
description: AiScan is the extremely Fast and Safety QR Code & Barcodes Reader out there. It is the essential APP for every Android device.  * Social Contact Scanner Link your friends. You can easily generate the personal QR Code and share with it your friends. They can scan it and follow your social media. (eg: Facebook. Instagram. Whatsapp)  * Business Scanner: You can easily save the Name and Phone of your business partners, or you can generate the QR Code of Email.  * Price Scanner You can scan product barcodes and compare prices online. Also, you can check whether is quality goods.   AiScan Features: - QR Code Reader.(Free for Clipboard, Website, Wi-Fi, Text, Contacts, Tel, E-Mail, SMS) - Barcode Scanner. - QR Code Generator. - Scan history, You can export all links via e-mail or reuse the link. - Flashlight supported for low-light environments. - Support Multiple Formats: EQS, QR Code, Data Matrix, Quick Code, EAN8, Code39, and Code128   Its very easy to use AiScan when you open the app, and then Align the Code, AI Scan will automatically recognize any QR codes. If the code contains a text, you can instantly see, or if the code contains URL, you can open the browser to the site.   Some advanced features and advanced features are only available as listed below in AI Scan, you can choose free features or subscribe to AiScan as needed. --- Generate QR CodesPayPal, Instagram, Facebook. Whatsapp, YouTube, Twitter, Spotify --- Customized Codes --- Scan more than three times  Subscriptions provided in AiScan are updated regularly, and you can enjoy the full content during the lifetime of your subscription. This is an auto-renewal subscription that automatically renews after a 3-day free trial. If you subscribe to AI Scan, we will charge your Google Play account and charge your account for renewals within 24 hours of the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time after purchase by going to the settings in the Play Store. The current subscription price is $9.99 per month and $29.99 per year and may differ from countries. Prices are in US dollars and may vary from country to country outside the United States and are subject to change without notice. If you do not choose to purchase AI Scan, you can continue to use it for free.
